# shoehorn_teams (Data Source)

Lists all Shoehorn teams.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all teams
data "shoehorn_teams" "all" {}

output "team_names" {
  value = [for t in data.shoehorn_teams.all.teams : t.name]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `teams` (Attributes List) The list of teams. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--teams))

<a id="nestedatt--teams"></a>
### Nested Schema for `teams`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) The team description.
- `display_name` (String) The display name of the team.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the team.
- `member_count` (Number) The number of team members.
- `name` (String) The team name.
- `slug` (String) The team slug.
